Uses of Class
biolockj.exception.MetadataException

  • Packages that use MetadataException 
    Package Description
    biolockj.module.implicit
    The modules in this package are implicitly added to pipelines as needed.
    These modules cannot be directly added to any pipeline unless overridden via pipeline.disableImplicitModules=Y.
    biolockj.util
    Static utilities centralize and organize reusable core methods.

    • Uses of MetadataException in biolockj.module.implicit

      Methods in biolockj.module.implicit that throw MetadataException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void ImportMetadata.buildNewMetadataFile()
      Create a simple metadata file in the module output directory, with only the 1st column populated with Sample IDs.
      protected TreeSet<String> ImportMetadata.getSampleIds()
      Extract the sample IDs from the file names with SeqUtil.getSampleId(String)

      Used to generate a guaranteed to be unique column name.

      Metadata file getter.

      Paired reads must have a unique file suffix to identify forward and reverse reads.
